Comments_List: basic knowledge about transport processes, interfacial phenomenon
I became familiar with mass balances through this course. I also learned about groundwater contamination and water treatment technologies like bank filtration.
Transport phenomena and their equations derivation and its applications to relatively simple systems
teacher explains the problems and knowledge carefully

Overall, I think this course was really well-organized. The notes were clear and helpful. I like that the exams were not cumulative and focused on different aspects. 
The only problem I had during my study was to correct the mistakes in my homework because I usually discussed the homework problems with TF or other students before I turned in and I thought I already made my best answers. I think I should be more active to ask for help to correct my answers but maybe it's also helpful for the TF or instructor to post standard answers online.
More content and after class exercises
Yes, it is very helpful for setting a general image of transport processes
